name: dustStorm_day (Start)
editor_name: dustStorm_day（开始，关闭需对应特殊天气）
desc: Sandstorm surges, knocking back the target by <style=red>2</style> tiles after dealing Melee DMG. If [Collision] occurs, the target will be [Stunned] for 1 turn.
